content: How about this. How about you give him the exact steps he needs to do including creating and running the script and getting everything moved. If he needs to return to me to have me load the Bach files with a command, he should be instructed to do that. Like, "I've completed the initial setup as request, please run ... to transfer the Bach files to my environment and confirm when completed so I can continue". Does that make sense? If so, can you update his implementation instructions artifact one more time? Then I think we're ready.
